MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:37pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and complex repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:24am on 13th January
